this_title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina Season 1
introduction: Saving the Ocean is about people solving problems. Some of the news may be grim: overfishing, pollution, coral reefs are in trouble. But a group of unsung heroes--scientists, conservationists, local communities--are hard at work inventing, advocating, and implementing solutions. Join marine biologist Carl Safina as he takes viewers around the globe to bring back good news from the world's oceans.S1 E1 - Shark ReefS1 E2 - The Sacred IslandS1 E3 - Destination BajaS1 E4 - Swordfish!, Part 1S1 E5 - Swordfish!, Part 2S1 E6 - River of Kings, Part 1S1 E7 - River of Kings, Part 2S1 E8 - Trinidad's Turtle GiantsS1 E9 - Cod Comeback?S1 E10 - Scourge of the Lionfish
chinese_title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina Season 1
